TABLE.NAME: block_advnotifications
TABLE.COMMENT: A record of all advanced notifications

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: To be used for notification's title

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: To be used as notification's message

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: What type of notification to be displayed

FIELD.NAME: aicon
FIELD.COMMENT: Toggle whether an icon should be displayed or not

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Toggle whether notification is enabled/displayed or not

FIELD.NAME: global
FIELD.COMMENT: Toggles whether notification is a global or instance-based

FIELD.NAME: blockid
FIELD.COMMENT: Toggles whether notification is a global or instance-based

FIELD.NAME: dismissible
FIELD.COMMENT: Toggles whether notification is dismissible by user or not

FIELD.NAME: date_from
FIELD.COMMENT: From when the notification should be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: date_to
FIELD.COMMENT: Until when the notification will be displayed to users

FIELD.NAME: times
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of times a user has to see the notification

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: A flag to keep track of whether the notification has been deleted

FIELD.NAME: deleted_at
FIELD.COMMENT: Record of when the notification was deleted

FIELD.NAME: deleted_by
FIELD.COMMENT: Record of which user deleted the notification

FIELD.NAME: created_by
FIELD.COMMENT: Record of which user created the notification

TABLE.NAME: block_advnotificationsdissed
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps track of user interaction with advanced notifications

FIELD.NAME: user_id
FIELD.COMMENT: User related to occurrence of notification

FIELD.NAME: dismissed
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag of whether user dismissed occurrence of notification or not

FIELD.NAME: seen
FIELD.COMMENT: Record of number of times a user has seen the notification
